posts.content:
Firstly thanks for the ad d - always wanted a SS and picked up a 69 Brazilian in need of some TLC.
A few “hours” later I’ve removed both Rear Bearing Covers and noted gouge marks and heavy rusting inside the covers themselves. Bottom line is I like to replace both - problem
Is does anyone actually sell/reproduce them? I’ve tried many of the usual culprits all to no avail so I wonder if there is any nugget suppliers out there? I’m anticipating 69 Split is the same as a 67.
Any help would be appreciated to get Pedro back on the road. Cheers All (in advance) - and again thanks for add.

Long shot - not only are the covers seemingly impossible to source so are the four bearing cover bolts (albeit these are also referred to as rear cover retaining screws)...any ideas, anyone

Cheers All
